metadata.name: Apo Sulfasalazine Tab 500mg 500 mg Tablet film coated

clinical_particulars.therapeutic_indications: For the treatment of Crohn s disease and rheumatoid arthritis as a second line agent

contraindications.pharmacodynamics: Sulfasalazine is an anti inflammatory indicated for the treatment of ulcerative colitis and rheumatoid arthritis
